title: POLICY OF APPOINTING BEST PERSON AS PRINCIPAL SEEMS TO BE WAVERING: REGINALD
content: The policy I adopted in appointing the most suitable persons to posts of principal seems to be wavering, says Reginald Cooray, Minister of Minor Export Crops Promotion yesterday. He was addressing a function held to launch the website of the Alutgama Sri Gnanissara Maha Vidyalaya. Students who had excelled both in academic and extra curricular…
